# DOCKYARD 'MOTLEY ANNE'
[color=#a4885c]Ship Size:[/color] Medium
[color=#a4885c]Recommended Crew:[/color] 1-3
[color=#a4885c]Power Gen Type:[/color] AME
[color=#a4885c]Expeditions:[/color] None
[color=#a4885c]IFF Console:[/color] Included
"The Motley Anne is a mobile dockyard manufactured by Ikarus Ethics Divisions military production line for Vanguard use. It provides a closer back line for engagements in order to safely and quickly resupply."
# PREFLIGHT CHECKLIST
## 1. Power supply
## 1.1. Battery units
- Check that the dual AME setup is in place. - Check that the SMES unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the substation unit is anchored to the floor. - Check that the rear APC unit's Main Breaker is toggled on. - Check the APC units current Load* (W). - Check that the front APC unit's Main Breaker is toggled on. - Check the APC units' current Load* (W).
## 1.2. AME unit.
- Check that the AME unit has at least one core. - Make sure the injector is adjacent to the shielding. - Check that the AME unit is connected to the cable terminal of your SMES via HV. - Check the fuel remaining of the AME unit. - Set the AME unit output power to 2 injections. - Enable Injection.
## 2. Atmospherics
## 2.1. Distribution Loop
- Check that the O2 canister is anchored to the BLUE connector port. - Check that the N2 canister is anchored to the RED connector port. - Check that the gas mixer is set to the correct mixing ratio (~22% Oxygen, ~78% Nitrogen). - Check that the gas mixer is set to 101.325kPa. - Enable gas mixer.
## 3. Other checks
- Check that the gyroscope is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the mini gravity generator is anchored, powered, and enabled. - Check that the station anchor is not active until needed.
## Fighters
- The fighters Motley Anne produces have specially shaped docks that must either be refit for general use or docked back at the dockyard to resupply. - No fighters come equipped with an atmospheric setup or gravity generation, prepare for a bumpy flight.
## Sidenotes
- The Motley Anne comes with gas miners for resupply at any time. - The SMES array located in the engineering section has room for additional batteries to be charged and used elsewhere. - The small compartment in the dockyard can be used for a silo to provide universal materials to the mech stations. - The dockyard is intended to hold artillery for fighters to resupply quickly and redeploy from their respective ports. - The server inside the dockyard compartment comes with universal ammo for producing fighter bomber artillery.
